names.meaning: She manifests in the form of languages.

names.name: बृहत्सेना
names.meaning: She has a large army at Her disposal to accomplish her tasks.

names.name: भावाभावविवर्जिता
names.meaning: She is beyond the states of bhāva and abhāva.

names.name: सुखाराध्या
names.meaning: She can be worshiped easily and comfortably without putting the body through great pains.

names.name: शुभकरी
names.meaning: She causes auspiciousness (subha).

names.name: शोभनासुलभागतिः
names.meaning: She leads us on the most easy and auspicious path towards self-realization.

names.name: राजराजेश्वरी
names.meaning: She is the empress of all the empresses in the creation.

names.name: राज्यदायिनी
names.meaning: As She bestowed the kingdoms (rājya) on to the Lords of the eight directions (ashta dik pālaka), She is Rājya dāyini.

names.name: राज्यवल्लभा
names.meaning: She delights in having ownership of the heart.

names.name: राजत्कृपा
names.meaning: She is overflowing with kindness and compassion.

names.name: राजपीठनिवेशितनिजाश्रिता
names.meaning: She seats all those who have placed implicit trust in Her on the throne (Rāja pītha).

names.name: राज्यलक्ष्मी
names.meaning: Savitri vidya extols the Divine Mother as the wealth and prosperity (Lakshmi) of the (rājya).

names.name: कोशनाथा
names.meaning: She is the guardian of the treasures (wealth, kosa) of the empire.

names.name: चतुरङ्गबलेश्वरी
names.meaning: She is the force that protects all the four divisions of the army.

names.name: साम्राज्यदायिनी
names.meaning: She bestows the kingship and kingdom.

names.name: सत्यसन्धा
names.meaning: Her resolves all are woven around truth (satya); She is bound by truth.

names.name: सागरमेखला
names.meaning: Oceans that protect the earth are Her retained by Her as Her waist band.

names.name: दीक्षिता
names.meaning: Deekshita is She who has taken an uncompromising vow or a solemn promise. Protection of Her devotees is Her main vow.

names.name: दैत्यशमनी
names.meaning: She destroys all evil forces, evil thoughts and evil feelings which are demons (daitya).

names.name: सर्वलोकवशङ्करी
names.meaning: She holds all the worlds (sarva-loka) under Her sway.

names.name: सर्वार्थदात्री
names.meaning: She who fulfils every desires of her devotees is Sarvārtha-dātrī.

names.name: सावित्री
names.meaning: She is the cause for the illumination of this Sun and hence is known as Savitri.

names.name: सच्चिदानन्दरूपिणी
names.meaning: She is the form of Sacchidānanda.

names.name: देशकालापरिच्छिन्ना
names.meaning: She who is not limited by time and space; She who is not

names.name: सर्वगा
names.meaning: She who pervades all the worlds and all the living and

names.name: सर्वमोहिनी
names.meaning: She who deludes all

names.name: सरस्वती
names.meaning: She who is in the form of knowledge

names.name: शास्त्रमयी
names.meaning: She who is in the form of the scriptures; She whose limbs are

names.name: गुहाम्बा
names.meaning: She who is the mother of guha (subramaNya); She who dwells in

names.name: गुह्यरूपिणी
names.meaning: She who has a secret form

names.name: सर्वोपाधिविनिर्मुक्ता
names.meaning: She who is free from all limitations

names.name: सदाशिवपतिव्रता
names.meaning: She who is sadAshiva's devoted wife

names.name: सम्प्रदायेश्वरी
names.meaning: She who is the guardian of sacred traditions

names.name: साधु
names.meaning: स्हे रेप्रेसेन्त्स् गोओद् अन्द् औस्पिचिओउस् त्रैत्स् (साधु)। ॐ साधुने नमह्! (She represents good and auspicious traits (sādhu). Om Sādhune namah!)

names.name: ई
names.meaning: स्हे इस् अ फ़ोर्म् ओफ़् विस्ह्नु। ॐ एएयै नमह्! (She is a form of Vishnu. Om Eeyai namah!)

names.name: गुरूमण्डलरूपिणी
names.meaning: She is the unbroken lineage of Gurus (Guru मन्डल)- (manḍala)-) from Sadāshiva to one’s own guru.

names.name: कुलोत्तीर्णा
names.meaning: She is over and above the Chakras (spiritual centers known as kula).

names.name: भगाराध्या
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: माया
names.meaning: She is the individual illusion and ignorance.

names.name: मधुमती
names.meaning: Every action of Hers is attractive and tempting akin to honey. She is honey (madhu).

names.name: मही
names.meaning: स्हे इस् थे मोथेर् एअर्थ् (भुमी)। (She is the Mother earth (bhumī).)

names.name: गणाम्बा
names.meaning: She is the mother of Ganapati. She is also the ruler of all the various ganās (troops) in this creation including Shiva’s attendants (Shiva-ganās).

names.name: गुह्यकाराध्या
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: कोमलाङ्गी
names.meaning: She has very delicate limbs.

names.name: गुरुप्रिया
names.meaning: To Her, the tradition of following a Guru (Guru sampradaya) is very dear. She coaxes her devotees to get on the path of the Guru.

names.name: स्वतन्त्रा
names.meaning: Being self-created She enjoys absolute freedom.

names.name: सर्वतन्त्रेशी
names.meaning: She is the composite form of all Tantras. She is the creator of all Tantras and rules them.

names.name: दक्षिणामूर्तिरूपिणी
names.meaning: She has manifested as Lord Dakshināmūrty to bestow knowledge (jnana).

names.name: सनकादिसमाराध्या
names.meaning: She is worshipped by the 4 Maharishis- Sanaka, Sanandana, Sanatkumara and Sanatsujaata.

names.name: शिवज्ञानप्रदायिनी
names.meaning: She bestows the knowledge of Shiva on to Her devotees.

names.name: चित्कला
names.meaning: स्हे रेसिदेस् अस् चित्-कला इन् एवेर्य् बेइन्ग्। (She resides as Cit-kalā in every being.)

names.name: आनन्दकलिका
names.meaning: She dwells in every being in the form of bliss (ānanda) that is in a budding/ blossoming state.

names.name: प्रेमरूपा
names.meaning: She is an embodiment of love.

names.name: प्रियङ्करी
names.meaning: प्रियंकरी (Priyaṃkarī) is the bliss that results from developing endless love (bhakti, devotion) towards the Divinity. The Divine Mother is this bliss.

names.name: नामपारायणप्रीता
names.meaning: She is exceedingly pleased when Divine names are recited (nama-parayana).

names.name: नन्दिविद्या
names.meaning: She manifests as ‘Nandi vidya’- the scripture that deals with merger/ absorption into Her.

names.name: नटेश्वरी
names.meaning: She is the energy of Lord Nateshwara (Natarāja, Shiva) who is performing the dance of bliss (tāndava).

names.name: मिथ्याजगदधिष्ठाना
names.meaning: She is the cause and refuge for this illusory universe (mithya-jagat).

names.name: मुक्तिदा
names.meaning: She relieves the true devotee from the bondages and grants him liberation (mukti).

names.name: मुक्तिरूपिणी
names.meaning: Liberation (mukti) is also Her form (roopa).

names.name: लास्यप्रिया
names.meaning: She is very fond of dance. Dance performed by Divine Mother is known as lāsya.

names.name: लयकरी
names.meaning: Due to Her grace, the devotee is able to merge (laya) his mind into that infinite. She is the cause for it.

names.name: लज्जा
names.meaning: Modesty is her greatest jewel.

names.name: रम्भादिवन्दिता
names.meaning: Divine damsels such as Rambha ardently worship Her.

names.name: भवदावसुधावृष्टिः
names.meaning: She is the rain of nectar (amruta varsha) that extinguishes the forest fire (dhava) known as samsara (bhava).

names.name: पापारण्यदवानला
names.meaning: She is the fire who reduces to ashes the heaps (forest) of sins of Her devotees.

names.name: दौर्भाग्यतूलवातूला
names.meaning: She is the huge gale that blows and shreds the misfortunes of her devotees, which can be compared to small cotton ball.

names.name: जराध्वान्तरविप्रभा
names.meaning: She is the bright sunlight that dispels ill-health and other problems of old age.

names.name: भाग्याब्धिचन्द्रिका
names.meaning: She is the moonlight that causes the ocean of good luck to swell in her devotees.

names.name: भक्तचित्तकेकिघनाघना
names.meaning: Just as the peacock dances in joy at the sight of the rain/clouds, She causes the minds of the devotee to dance in joy.

names.name: रोगपर्वतदम्भोलिः
names.meaning: She is the Vajrāyudhā (diamond weapon of Lord Indra) that can shred diseases of the body and mind which are as huge as mountains.

names.name: मृत्युदारुकुठारिका
names.meaning: She is the huge axe that chops the tree called death.

names.name: महेश्वरी
names.meaning: As She has retained the Supreme Lord Eshwara under her sway She is Māheshwarī.

names.name: महाकाली
names.meaning: She manifests as Mahā-kālī.

names.name: महाग्रासा
names.meaning: She swallows everything.

names.name: महाशना
names.meaning: She eats away the entire universe.

names.name: अपर्णा
names.meaning: Devi Parvati lived without eating even leaves when She was seeking the Lord and hence got the name Aparnā. She who relieves her devotees from runa (indebtedness) is Aparnā.

names.name: चण्डिका
names.meaning: She gets tremendously angry with those who entertain demonic thoughts, display evil traits and pursue bad habits.

names.name: चण्डमुण्डासुरनिषूदिनी
names.meaning: In Her form as Chandika, She destroyed the evil demons Chanda and Munda, and was bestowed with the name Chamundi.

names.name: क्षराक्षरात्मिका
names.meaning: She is both impermanent (destructible) and permanent (eternal).

names.name: सर्वलोकेशी
names.meaning: She is the empress who rules all the 14-worlds (lokas, planes).

names.name: विश्वधारिणी
names.meaning: She bears/ supports the entire creation. She holds all the worlds within Her womb.

names.name: त्रिवर्गदात्री
names.meaning: She bestows the Tri-vargas of Dharma, Artha and Kaama.

names.name: सुभगा
names.meaning: She grants auspiciousness to all the 3 worlds. Through devotion (bhakti) She grants liberation (mukti). Such Divine Mother is known as Subhagā. Ladies benefit through worshipping Her.

names.name: त्र्यम्बका
names.meaning: She is the energy of that Lord Shiva who possesses 3 eyes. It also means that She has 3 eyes.

names.name: त्रिगुणात्मिका
names.meaning: She is the personification of the 3 gunas.

names.name: स्वर्गापवर्गदा
names.meaning: Where there are comforts there can be no liberation; where the mind entertains thoughts of liberation there can be no comforts. Yet, to a person who devotedly worships the ever-beautiful Goddess, both bhoga (comforts) and liberation (Moksha) can occur in parallel.

names.name: शुद्धा
names.meaning: She is eternally pure.

names.name: जपापुष्पनिभाकृतिः
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: ओजोवती
names.meaning: She is full of ojas.

names.name: द्युतिधरा
names.meaning: She emits magnificent radiance (kānti).

names.name: यज्ञरूपा
names.meaning: She is the form of yagna.

names.name: प्रियव्रता
names.meaning: She is very fond of vows and disciplines (vrata).

names.name: दुराराध्या
names.meaning: Worshipping/ reaching Her is very difficult.

names.name: दुराधर्षा
names.meaning: No person can hold Her under his sway. She can only be pleased but not controlled.

names.name: पाटलीकुसुमप्रिया
names.meaning: She loves the Bignonia Suaveolens (pātali) flowers.

names.name: महती
names.meaning: She is vast, immeasurable and great.

names.name: मेरुनिलया
names.meaning: Mountain Meru is Her residence.

names.name: मन्दारकुसुमप्रिया
names.meaning: She loves the hibiscus flower (mandāra) that is red in colour.

names.name: वीराराध्या
names.meaning: The valiant warriors (virya) devoutly worship Her.

names.name: विराड्रूपा
names.meaning: She is the universal form. She has manifested in the form of this entire visible world.

names.name: विरजा
names.meaning: She is devoid of trait of rajas (rajo guna, passion, action).

names.name: विश्वतोमुखी
names.meaning: This entire visible world is Her face.

names.name: प्रत्यग्रूपा
names.meaning: She resides within every individual being in the form of the individual soul (jeevātma).

names.name: पराकाशा
names.meaning: She pervades the most-superior space i.e. the space of the heart (hrdayākāsha).

names.name: प्राणदा
names.meaning: She bestows the life force (prāna) on the individual.

names.name: प्राणरूपिणी
names.meaning: She resides in the form of the life force (prana) (as explained in the previous name).

names.name: मार्ताण्डभैरवाराध्या
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: मन्त्रिणीन्यस्तराज्यधूः
names.meaning: She entrusted the responsibility of ruling (kingship) to Goddess Shyamala, who is also known as Mantrini.

names.name: त्रिपुरेशी
names.meaning: She is the ruler of Tripura.

names.name: जयत्सेना
names.meaning: She leads a large army that is always victorious.

names.name: निस्त्रैगुण्या
names.meaning: She is devoid of the three gunas (traits).

names.name: परापरा
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: सत्यज्ञानानन्दरूपा
names.meaning: Truth (satya), knowledge/consciousness  (Jnana) and bliss (roopa) are Her forms.

names.name: सामरस्यपरायणा
names.meaning: She is pleased when her devotees exhibit traits of understanding and harmony with respect to other people in society.

names.name: कपर्दिनी
names.meaning: She is the wife (energy) of that Lord Kapardi (Shiva) who holds Ganga in his matted locks (जता)। ((jatā).)

names.name: कलामाला
names.meaning: She wears the various kalās (arts, phases) as a garland around Her neck.

names.name: कामधुक्
names.meaning: She is Kamadhenu- the wish-fulfilling cow. She fulfills every desire of Her devotees.

names.name: कामरूपिणी
names.meaning: कामरूपिणी (Kāmarūpiṇī) means She can assume any form as per Her will.

names.name: कलानिधिः
names.meaning: She is a treasure house (nidhi) of all kalas (arts).

names.name: काव्यकला
names.meaning: She is truly worthy of praise.

names.name: रसज्ञा
names.meaning: She is the finest amongst all the essences (rasa, flavour). Rasa is Her form.

names.name: रसशेवधिः
names.meaning: She is an never-ending ocean of bliss, which is the most-supreme rasa.

names.name: पुष्टा
names.meaning: She is a form of completeness. She grants opulence, nourishment and development to the mind and intellect so that it can achieve this completeness.

names.name: पुरातना
names.meaning: She is very ancient (eternal).

names.name: पूज्या
names.meaning: She is most worthy of worship. She is deemed worthy of worship even by the various Gods. She accepts all the offerings of the devotees.

names.name: पुष्करा
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: पुष्करेक्षणा
names.meaning: Her beautiful eyes are like lotus petals.

names.name: परञ्ज्योतिः
names.meaning: Illumination is of various forms- the inner light/illumination (antar jyoti), the external light (bahir jyoti) and individual illumination (pratyak jyoti). Such illumination is ageless (eternal, sanātana). It is the foundation for all other types of illumination and is self-ignited (swayam jyotih, which does not need support). Such illumination is the illumination of the self (atma-jyoti) who is none other than Shiva himself (shivosmyaham)!

names.name: परन्धाम
names.meaning: It is Her effulgence that illuminates the Sun, Moon and Fire. But for this, the Sun, Moon or fire would have failed in dispersing light. Her residence is the ultimate abode; one from which there can be no return and no further upward journey.

names.name: परमाणुः
names.meaning: She is the sub-atomic particle. She is the most-minute and subtle element within the atom.

names.name: परात्परा
names.meaning: She is superior to even that which is considered the most-superior.

names.name: पाशहस्ता
names.meaning: She holds the pāsa (noose) in her hand.

names.name: पाशहन्त्री
names.meaning: She relieves the devotee from bondages (pāshas) and grants him liberation.

names.name: परमन्त्रविभेदिनी
names.meaning: She destroys blackmagic-mantras and other the evil energies that are directed by other people (para) towards her devotees.

names.name: मूर्ता
names.meaning: She is both with-form (Murta) and without-form (Amurta).

names.name: अमूर्ता
names.meaning: She who has no definite form

names.name: अनित्यतृप्ता
names.meaning: Any offering, however trivial it may be, is accepted by Me joyfully when offered with total devotion. The offering could be a mere leaf, flower or just water.

names.name: मुनिमानसहंसिका
names.meaning: She is the swan (hamsa) who swims in the mind (manas sarovar) of the great munis (Maharishis).

names.name: सत्यव्रता
names.meaning: To abide by truth (satya) is Her vow (vrata). Truth is dearest to Her.

names.name: सत्यरूपा
names.meaning: She is eternal and is the form of truth.

names.name: सर्वान्तर्यामिनी
names.meaning: She exists within every being (soul). She flows within the heart and mind of every being.

names.name: सती
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: ब्रह्माणी
names.meaning: She is the mother of all Vedas. Here Vedas are being referred to as Brahma.

names.name: ब्रह्म
names.meaning: She who is brahman

names.name: जननी
names.meaning: She who is the mother

names.name: बहुरूपा
names.meaning: She manifests in innumerable forms.

names.name: बुधार्चिता
names.meaning: The wise, greatly-learned, knowledgeable persons (jnani, budha) worship Her.

names.name: प्रसवित्री
names.meaning: This entire universe emerged from Her womb.

names.name: प्रचण्डा
names.meaning: She takes on a ferocious angry form. Even deities are terrified of her ferocious form.

names.name: आज्ञा
names.meaning: Her command (ājñā) is the ultimate law.

names.name: प्रतिष्ठा
names.meaning: She is steadfast and firm. Only Paramatma can entertain an steadfast immobile mind and remain firmly in that manner.

names.name: प्रकटाकृतिः
names.meaning: Although being inherently in an unmanifest state, She takes on a clear and evident form (आकृति) ((ākṛti)) so that She can be easily reached by Her devotees.

names.name: प्राणेश्वरी
names.meaning: A mortal does not depend on the Prāna nor on the Apāna for his life; there is some other force on which these two (prāna and apāna) depend; the being thus depends on this supreme force for its life.

names.name: प्राणदात्री
names.meaning: She bestows prana (life) upon the being.

names.name: पञ्चाशत्पीठरूपिणी
names.meaning: She is the form of the 51 shakti peethas.

names.name: विश‍ृङ्खला
names.meaning: As Shrunkala Devi She unties the knots of the bondages of Her devotees. She is not bound by any bondages. She unties the granthis (Brahma, Vishnu and Rudra granthis, discussed earlier).

names.name: विविक्तस्था
names.meaning: She enjoys being all alone (ekanta/ exclusiveness). She loves ekanta puja offered by her devotees.

names.name: वीरमाता
names.meaning: She is the Mother of heroic and valorous sons. Lord Ganapati, Lord Subrahmanya, Veerabhadra and many eminent yogis are referred to as Veera.

names.name: वियत्प्रसूः
names.meaning: She has given birth to this vast space (akasha, viyat). She is the mother to the entire vast limitless sky.

names.name: मुकुन्दा
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: मुक्तिनिलया
names.meaning: Liberation (mukti) is Her residence (nilaya).

names.name: मूलविग्रहरूपिणी
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: भावज्ञा
names.meaning: She knows our inner most thoughts and intent. One who is aware of our thought (bhava or intent) is Bhāvajñā.

names.name: भवरोगघ्नी
names.meaning: She burns away the diseases (roga) of this samsara (bhava).

names.name: भवचक्रप्रवर्तिनी
names.meaning: She is the cause of this bhava chakra (cycle of births and deaths, samsara).

names.name: छन्दःसारा
names.meaning: All the Vedas speak about ‘Me’ alone. I am its author.

names.name: शास्त्रसारा
names.meaning: ‘Shastra’ means that which teaches the pravritti dharma (duty in the worldly/ external life), the nivritti dharma (duty in spiritual life, inward path), the knowledge about that which is permanent and true (nitya), and that which adopts fictitious examples (krtaka) for our understanding of the supreme truth.

names.name: मन्त्रसारा
names.meaning: In the word ‘Mantra, the alphabet ‘ma’ stands for manana (recitation, repetition); ‘tra’ refers to the protection that is offered to such person.

names.name: तलोदरी
names.meaning: a)	She possesses very good health.b)	 She retains all the Vedas in Her stomach (udara).

names.name: उदारकीर्तिः
names.meaning: Her reputation and fame are infinite and vast.

names.name: उद्दामवैभवा
names.meaning: She cannot be measured. She cannot be bound.

names.name: वर्णरूपिणी
names.meaning: All the alphabets (varna, akshara) are Her forms.

names.name: जन्ममृत्युजरातप्तजनविश्रान्तिदायिनी
names.meaning: She washes away the suffering/ afflictions of birth (janma), death (mrtyu) and old age (जरा) ((jarā)) and thus provides rest/relief to her devotees.

names.name: सर्वोपनिषदुद्घुष्टा
names.meaning: All the Upanishads proclaim or speak about Her only. They sing Her glories.

names.name: शान्त्यतीतकलात्मिका
names.meaning: She is the form of the kala (art, specialization) that exists over and above the state of complete peace.

names.name: गम्भीरा
names.meaning: She is like a complete, deep ocean whose end/depth cannot be fathomed.

names.name: गगनान्तस्था
names.meaning: She fills the entire space (gagana).

names.name: गर्विता
names.meaning: One who has the pride of being the creator is Garvita.

names.name: गानलोलुपा
names.meaning: She is immersed in music and is enraptured by good music.

names.name: कल्पनारहिता
names.meaning: She is beyond imagination (kalpana) and cannot be achieved through kalpana.

names.name: काष्ठा
names.meaning: She is the ultimate and final goal- sa kāsthā sa परा (parā) gatih.

names.name: अकान्ता
names.meaning: She destroys sin.

names.name: कान्तार्धविग्रहा
names.meaning: She is the other half in Shiva’s Ardhanareeshwara form (half male- half female).

names.name: कार्यकारणनिर्मुक्ता
names.meaning: She is beyond all cause and action (kārana and kārya). Her existence is not based on them.

names.name: कामकेलितरङ्गिता
names.meaning: She is the continuous flow of intentions (taranga) behind this play (creation) of Shiva (kāma).

names.name: कनत्कनकताटङ्का
names.meaning: Her earrings made of gold glitter.

names.name: लीलाविग्रहधारिणी
names.meaning: She who is omni present, playfully assumes as many forms as She wills.

names.name: अजा
names.meaning: I was never born before nor will I be ever be born. I am eternal.

names.name: क्षयविनिर्मुक्ता
names.meaning: She can never shrink nor decay. She is eternal.

names.name: मुग्धा
names.meaning: She is lovely attractive and tender young girl.

names.name: क्षिप्रप्रसादिनी
names.meaning: She showers Her grace/ blessings instantly on Her devotees.

names.name: अन्तर्मुखसमाराध्या
names.meaning: She can be reached purely through inner vision and inner practices (antar yāga or antar yoga).

names.name: बहिर्मुखसुदुर्लभा
names.meaning: It is very difficult to attain Her through pure external worship that is devoid of faith.

names.name: त्रयी
names.meaning: She appears as the 3 Vedas.

names.name: त्रिवर्गनिलया
names.meaning: There are only 3 main planes of existence (lokas, worlds). They are the Bhu loka, Bhuvar loka and Suvar loka. All other planes merge into them. All the planes below the earth (bhu) merge into the Bhu loka (earth plane). All the planes above merge into the Bhuvar loka. The entire space (antareeksha) merges into the Suvar loka.

names.name: त्रिस्था
names.meaning: She resides within the tri (three) states of existence (avastha).

names.name: त्रिपुरमालिनी
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: निरामया
names.meaning: No disease ever troubles Her. She also relieves her devotees from suffering due to the diseases.

names.name: निरालम्बा
names.meaning: She is the support for the entire creation and does not lean on any support for Her sustenance.

names.name: स्वात्मारामा
names.meaning: She enjoys being all by herself (ekānta).

names.name: सुधास्रुतिः / सृतिः
names.meaning: She is the perennial flow of bliss (nectar, sudha, amrita). This is the state of endless bliss.

names.name: संसारपङ्कनिर्मग्नसमुद्धरणपण्डिता
names.meaning: You appear like sunlight to those who are drowned in ignorance (ajnana) that is like a fearful darkness (timira). You make the minds of the dull witted (जदा) ((jadā)) grow fertile and turn it eligible to receive the knowledge of the self. You are the Cintāmani gem (wish fulfilling gem) to those who are sunk in poverty (daridra). You are Vāhari Devi (boar faced) and using your tusks you pull up those who are deeply sunk (nimagna) in this samsāra.

names.name: यज्ञप्रिया
names.meaning: She cherishes yajña and offerings made through yagna.

names.name: यज्ञकर्त्री
names.meaning: She is the energy that propels us to perform yagna.

names.name: यजमानस्वरूपिणी
names.meaning: She is seated in her position of yajamāna (the person performing the yagna).

names.name: धर्माधारा
names.meaning: She is the support (ādhara) for all the dharmās.

names.name: धनाध्यक्षा
names.meaning: She assumes authority over money (dhana).

names.name: धनधान्यविवर्धिनी
names.meaning: She causes opulence in wealth (dhana) and food grains (dhānya).

names.name: विप्रप्रिया
names.meaning: Exponents of Vedas are very dear to Her.

names.name: विप्ररूपा
names.meaning: She manifests in the form of vipras.

names.name: विश्वभ्रमणकारिणी
names.meaning: She puts the world under Her spell of illusion (maya, brama). She causes the rotation of the worldly cycle (vishwa Yantra).

names.name: विश्वग्रासा
names.meaning: She swallows the entire universe. The universe is Her food.

names.name: विद्रुमाभा
names.meaning: She glows like the coral.

names.name: वैष्णवी
names.meaning: As Vishnu’s energy, She is Vaishnavi. She is the power of sustenance.

names.name: विष्णुरूपिणी
names.meaning: She manifests as Lord Vishnu.

names.name: अयोनिः
names.meaning: She is without birth.

names.name: योनिनिलया
names.meaning: The Trikona (triangle) is being called the yoni. This is Her residence. In the Srichakra, after the Trikona is the top-most dot (bindu).

names.name: कूटस्था
names.meaning: She is firm and remains immobile. She is the cause for all the movement in this universe and in all the beings while herself remaining immobile. She is a witness for all the actions.

names.name: कुलरूपिणी
names.meaning: She is the form of Mooladhara Chakra, which is the Kula. (Refer Nama ९०-कुलाम्र्तैक-रसिका (90-Kulāmrtaika-rasikā) and nama 93 – Kulāntasthā for meaning of Kula)

names.name: वीरगोष्ठीप्रिया
names.meaning: She enjoys the teachings of the great saints.

names.name: वीरा
names.meaning: a) She is valourous. She is the destroyer of demons.

names.name: नैष्कर्म्या
names.meaning: She rewards her disciple with the ability to perform nishkaama karma (performance of selfless/ desireless action).

names.name: नादरूपिणी
names.meaning: She is in the form of nāda (sound) (refer nāma 299, nāda-rūpā)

names.name: विज्ञानकलना
names.meaning: She can be reached purely through Vijñāna.

names.name: कल्या
names.meaning: Only She is worthy of being thought about. Other thoughts are all un-worthy.

names.name: विदग्धा
names.meaning: She is the powerhouse of intelligence and cleverness. She is the supreme effulgence (chaitanya).

names.name: बैन्दवासना
names.meaning: She is seated in the asana (pose) that is best suited for the bindu (dot) position.

names.name: तत्त्वाधिका
names.meaning: She is the eternal force which is over and above all the tattvas (principles).

names.name: तत्त्वमयी
names.meaning: She is an embodiment of all the principles (tattvas). All the tattvas are contained within her.

names.name: तत्त्वमर्थस्वरूपिणी
names.meaning: She is the essence of great statement- Tattvamasi.

names.name: सामगानप्रिया
names.meaning: She loves the rendition of the Sāma Veda and also Sama rāga (note).

names.name: सौम्या
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: सदाशिवकुटुम्बिनी
names.meaning: She is the wife/ energy of Sadāshiva.

names.name: सव्यापसव्यमार्गस्था
names.meaning: She exists in both Savya and Apasavya paths (mārgas).

names.name: सर्वापद्विनिवारिणी
names.meaning: She dispels every form of obstacle (sarva+āpad) that appears in the path of the devotee.

names.name: स्वस्था
names.meaning: She resides in Swarga (heaven) and bestows those planes to her devotees.

names.name: स्वभावमधुरा
names.meaning: Absolute Bliss is Her natural state.

names.name: धीरा
names.meaning: She is exceptionally brave.

names.name: धीरसमर्चिता
names.meaning: She accepts the worship that is offered by such dheeras (explained above).

names.name: चैतन्यार्घ्यसमाराध्या
names.meaning: Chaitanya (Jnana or effulgence) is offered to Her as अर्घ्या। (arghyā.) Arghya is the offering of water during the worship.

names.name: चैतन्यकुसुमप्रिया
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: सदोदिता
names.meaning: One who eternally (सदा) ((sadā)) rises like the Sun is सदोदिता। (sadoditā.) She shines eternally.

names.name: सदातुष्टा
names.meaning: She is ever contented.

names.name: तरुणादित्यपाटला
names.meaning: She is crimson red in colour- the colour of the just emerging sun.

names.name: दक्षिणादक्षिणाराध्या
names.meaning: She accepts the worship offered by both the knowledgeable and capable persons (jnanis) as well as the ignorant (ajnani).

names.name: दरस्मेरमुखाम्बुजा
names.meaning: She is eternally joyful and is laughing all the time. Her face is comparable to the blooming lotus- a stage wherein it is not a bud but that which has not fully bloomed yet.

names.name: कौलिनी केवला
names.meaning: She resides purely as the form of Kundalini.

names.name: अनर्घ्यकैवल्यपददायिनी
names.meaning: She bestows Anarghya-kaivalya (supreme or ultimate liberation the value of which cannot be estimated) on to Her devotees.

names.name: स्तोत्रप्रिया
names.meaning: She loves to hear the hymns (stotras) recited by Her devotees.

names.name: स्तुतिमती
names.meaning: Her attention (mati) is focused on the stotras (hymns, stuti) being recited.

names.name: श्रुतिसंस्तुतवैभवा
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: मनस्विनी
names.meaning: She is the controller (moola sutra) for all individual minds (manas). She is also the Manasvini yoga.

names.name: मानवती
names.meaning: She is the form of Jnana and she showers it upon the beings.

names.name: महेशी
names.meaning: She is the energy (wife) of Lord Mahesha (Shiva).

names.name: मङ्गलाकृतिः
names.meaning: Her form is very auspicious. She grants auspiciousness to that which is already auspicious.

names.name: विश्वमाता
names.meaning: She is mother for this entire creation (Vishwa). She is the mother for the waking state, which is also known as Vishwa.

names.name: जगद्धात्री
names.meaning: She is the ruler for the entire creation. She holds the creation.

names.name: विशालाक्षी
names.meaning: She is wide-eyed. She is the presiding deity at Varanasi which is one of the eighteen main shakti peethas (18 sacred places of Devi).

names.name: विरागिणी
names.meaning: She is devoid of all ragas (passions). She takes her children to this state of dispassion.

names.name: प्रगल्भा
names.meaning: She possesses great expertise, intelligence and power to run this entire creation.

names.name: परमोदारा
names.meaning: She is extremely generous in nature (udāra). Such generosity is a trait, which is greater than traits such as compassion (daya), forgiveness (kshama) etc.

names.name: परामोदा
names.meaning: She enjoys the ultimate bliss and bestows this bliss upon us.

names.name: मनोमयी
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: व्योमकेशी
names.meaning: The infinite space (vyoma, ākasha, sky) is Her hair (kesha).

names.name: विमानस्था
names.meaning: She is located in the Srichakra. This is the point of liberation (nivritti pada/ moksha sthāna).

names.name: वज्रिणी
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: वामकेश्वरी
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: पञ्चयज्ञप्रिया
names.meaning: She loves the offerings through the five sacrifices/ rituals (yagnas) –Deva- yagna, Pitr-yagna, Brahma-yagna, Bhuta-yagna, Manushya-yagna.

names.name: पञ्चप्रेतमञ्चाधिशायिनी
names.meaning: She is seated on the cot that is made up of the Pancha-pretas.

names.name: पञ्चमी
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: पञ्चभूतेशी
names.meaning: She assumes authority over the five basic elements (pancha bhootas). She is the power within these elements.

names.name: पञ्चसङ्ख्योपचारिणी
names.meaning: She is worshipped with the following five offerings.

names.name: शाश्वती
names.meaning: She is eternal.

names.name: शाश्वतैश्वर्या
names.meaning: She grants every-lasting prosperity (aishwarya) which is the showering of supreme knowledge (Jnana) upon Her devotee.

names.name: शर्मदा
names.meaning: She who causes auspiciousness is Śarmadā.

names.name: शम्भुमोहिनी
names.meaning: Hari (Vishnu) was once able to become a charming female (mohini) and stir waves of passion in the mind of the most impassioned Shiva who had earlier destroyed the three cities and was the enemy of the Lord of desire.

names.name: धरा
names.meaning: She is Mother Earth that supports all the beings on it.

names.name: धरसुता
names.meaning: She is the daughter of the Lord of the mountains (Himavan, Dhara). She is Parvati.

names.name: धन्या
names.meaning: She takes even ordinary beings to that state of being dhanya. She manifests in the form of holy-beings (sat-purushas).

names.name: धर्मिणी
names.meaning: She is the energy/wife of dharma (righteousness). She possesses the traits of dharmi and hence is Dharmini.

names.name: धर्मवर्धिनी
names.meaning: Controlling the indriyas, maintaining cleanliness, entertaining only good thoughts and developing/ promoting bhakti are all acts of human dharma.The 10 qualities of dharma are-

names.name: लोकातीता
names.meaning: She is over and above all planes of existence (lokas, worlds).

names.name: गुणातीता
names.meaning: Maintaining equanimity (neutrality) in situations of both praise (honour) and ill treatment (apamana); maintaining equality/ neutrality towards friends and foes is advisable. Such a person is गुणातीता। (Guṇātītā.)

names.name: सर्वातीता
names.meaning: She transcends everything in this creation. She is beyond sound, space, time, traits, planes and every other aspect of creation.

names.name: शमात्मिका
names.meaning: She is of peaceful and calm appearance.

names.name: बन्धूककुसुमप्रख्या
names.meaning: The Bandhuka flowers are very dear to Her.

names.name: बाला
names.meaning: She emerged as a 9-year-old girl (Bālā). In Srividya worship, Bālā mantra is of immense significance. As She grants good health and increases the longevity She is addressed as Bālā. She is Bāla-Tripura-Sundari.

names.name: लीलाविनोदिनी
names.meaning: She takes great pleasure in the plays/acts (lilās) of her devotees.

names.name: सुमङ्गली
names.meaning: That which is good (auspiciousness, prashastha) should be endlessly adhered to. Under no circumstances, even for a brief period should negatives be entertained. That which is inauspicious should be discarded. Time should never be wasted.

names.name: सुखकरी
names.meaning: She grants happiness (sukha).

names.name: सुवेषाढ्या
names.meaning: She looks graceful and auspicious in every form of attire.

names.name: सुवासिनी
names.meaning: She is the eternal suvasini (married woman) who is filled with divine traits.

names.name: सुवासिन्यर्चनप्रीता
names.meaning: She loves when worship is offered to Suvasini (married) women.

names.name: आशोभना
names.meaning: Āshobhanā stands for ‘āsamantāt Shobhana’i.e. the state of incomparable bliss (Brahmānandā).

names.name: शुद्धमानसा
names.meaning: She has a pure untainted mind and She blesses us with a pure mind and good thoughts.

names.name: बिन्दुतर्पणसन्तुष्टा
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: पूर्वजा
names.meaning: She exists even before the creation of the Trinity; She is Purvaja (ancient).

names.name: त्रिपुराम्बिका
names.meaning: She is Mother Tripura.

names.name: दशमुद्रासमाराध्या
names.meaning: She is worshipped with the 10 mudras that are offered to Her at the end of the worship.

names.name: त्रिपुराश्रीवशङ्करी
names.meaning: She has kept the Goddess Tripura-Sri under Her sway (Vasha), hence She is Tripura-Srivashamkari.

names.name: ज्ञानमुद्रा
names.meaning: She is the Jnana Mudra, also known as chin mudra.

names.name: ज्ञानगम्या
names.meaning: She can be achieved purely through knowledge (Jnana).

names.name: ज्ञानज्ञेयस्वरूपिणी
names.meaning: She is both Jnana (the knowledge) and jñeya (the object which is to be known).

names.name: योनिमुद्रा
names.meaning: She is the Yoni mudra also known as namaskara mudra.

names.name: त्रिखण्डेशी
names.meaning: She is the mother of the three gunas (traits of Sattva, Rajas and Tamas).

names.name: त्रिगुणा
names.meaning: She who is endowed with the three guNas of sattva, rajas and tamas

names.name: अम्बा
names.meaning: She who is mother of all beings; mother of the universe

names.name: त्रिकोणगा
names.meaning: She resides within the Trikona (triangle).

names.name: अनघा
names.meaning: She is pure and sinless.

names.name: अद्भुतचारित्रा
names.meaning: Her history (story) is marvelous.

names.name: वाञ्छितार्थप्रदायिनी
names.meaning: She bestows on Her devotees all that they seek.

names.name: अभ्यासातिशयज्ञाता
names.meaning: She can be known only through constant practice and constant worship.

names.name: षडध्वातीतरूपिणी
names.meaning: Commentary:

names.name: अव्याजकरुणामूर्तिः
names.meaning: She is a form of limitless true love and compassion.

names.name: अज्ञानध्वान्तदीपिका
names.meaning: Out of my causeless mercy for them, I dwelling in their hearts, destroy their darkness born of ignorance, with the lamp of pure knowledge.

names.name: आबालगोपविदिता
names.meaning: Everybody beginning from a small child right up to the cowherd knows about this energy. The knowing here is in the form of ‘I’ and ‘mine’.

names.name: सर्वानुल्लङ्घ्यशासना
names.meaning: No one in this entire creation, not even the deities can disobey/overrule Her dictates.

names.name: श्रीचक्रराजनिलया
names.meaning: She resides in the Srichakra which is the most-supreme Chakra.

names.name: श्रीमत्त्रिपुरसुन्दरी
names.meaning: She, who resides within the tripuras (three cities) takes on the name Tripura-sundari.

names.name: श्रीशिवा
names.meaning: Just as wind and its motion (spandana) are the same; just as fire and its heat are identical, even so, the Supreme Consciousness and His energy are identical. Such an attitude should be developed.

names.name: शिवशक्तैक्यरूपिणी
names.meaning: She is the combined aspect or the united force of Shiva and Shakti. This is the ultimate state.

names.name: ललिताम्बिका
names.meaning: Such a supreme force is worshipped as Mother Goddess Lalita Devi.
